Think about it, your dick is a wilting acorn, while China has a rising one. While USA has some democracy , China is a full-blown police state with slave workers and extreme disregard for climate pollution, the USA is very close to a full-blown surveillance state with slave prison workers and malicious disregard for climate pollution, which will probably kill all of us in some decades or even sooner than that.

You should destroy yourself, with what little dignity you think you have left. Hurry, while you still have the chance, to protect your eternal freedom from the commies, and to delay a moronic infestation of the whole world.

You  really didnt think it through. You can't just 'nuke somebody'. The whole of the cold war is as soon as you get missiles close to them, everyone else hits you lol!!!

Take your deathwish down to the beach
